channel.title: Matt Walz's Github site
channel.description: Recent content on Matt Walz's Github site

item.title: Is Kirk Cousins an Elite Passer?
item.description: As a lifelong Minnesota sports fan, I have become less optimistic about the product that is put in front of me from all of my hometown professional sports teams each year. Even when the team looks competitive all season, I know that when the playoffs roll around they’ll end up blowing it. I wanted to see if I could inspire some hope back into myself and other Minnesota sports fans, specifically Vikings fans for this scenario.

item.title: Did the rest of the Clemson starters step up when Trevor Lawrence got COVID
item.description: For my project I wanted to find out how the rest of the Clemson University football team played when their Heisman Finalist quarterback Trevor Lawrence had to sit due to COVID-19. I began by downloading the two libraries I needed. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.2 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.2 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.1 ✓ stringr 1.
